0.text: Answer the following questions. a) When did the friends meet? b) Where did they meet? c) Who are the friends? d) Who came late? e) What did Venura show his friends? f) What is Kaveesha going to do?
0.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Answer <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> following <break time='200ms'/> questions. <break time='200ms'/> a) <break time='200ms'/> When <break time='200ms'/> did <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> friends <break time='200ms'/> meet? <break time='200ms'/> b) <break time='200ms'/> Where <break time='200ms'/> did <break time='200ms'/> they <break time='200ms'/> meet? <break time='200ms'/> c) <break time='200ms'/> Who <break time='200ms'/> are <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> friends? <break time='200ms'/> d) <break time='200ms'/> Who <break time='200ms'/> came <break time='200ms'/> late? <break time='200ms'/> e) <break time='200ms'/> What <break time='200ms'/> did <break time='200ms'/> Venura <break time='200ms'/> show <break time='200ms'/> his <break time='200ms'/> friends? <break time='200ms'/> f) <break time='200ms'/> What <break time='200ms'/> is <break time='200ms'/> Kaveesha <break time='200ms'/> going <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> do? <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

3.text: Listen and underline the correct answer to complete the sentences. Kaveesha's water magic
3.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Listen <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> underline <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> correct <break time='200ms'/> answer <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> complete <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> sentences. <break time='200ms'/> Kaveesha's <break time='200ms'/> water <break time='200ms'/> magic <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

4.text: (1) You need........ a) a glass and a piece of cardboard. b) a glass and a piece of paper.
4.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>(1) <break time='200ms'/> You <break time='200ms'/> need........ <break time='200ms'/> a) <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> glass <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> piece <break time='200ms'/> of <break time='200ms'/> cardboard. <break time='200ms'/> b) <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> glass <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> piece <break time='200ms'/> of <break time='200ms'/> paper. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

5.text: (2) Fill the glass ............. a) with sand. b) with water.
5.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>(2) <break time='200ms'/> Fill <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> glass <break time='200ms'/> ............. <break time='200ms'/> a) <break time='200ms'/> with <break time='200ms'/> sand. <break time='200ms'/> b) <break time='200ms'/> with <break time='200ms'/> water. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

6.text: (3) Put the cardboard................... a) over the mouth of the glass. b) into the glass.
6.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>(3) <break time='200ms'/> Put <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> cardboard................... <break time='200ms'/> a) <break time='200ms'/> over <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> mouth <break time='200ms'/> of <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> glass. <break time='200ms'/> b) <break time='200ms'/> into <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> glass. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

7.text: (4) You should......... a) let air bubbles enter the glass. b) not let air bubbles enter the glass.
7.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>(4) <break time='200ms'/> You <break time='200ms'/> should......... <break time='200ms'/> a) <break time='200ms'/> let <break time='200ms'/> air <break time='200ms'/> bubbles <break time='200ms'/> enter <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> glass. <break time='200ms'/> b) <break time='200ms'/> not <break time='200ms'/> let <break time='200ms'/> air <break time='200ms'/> bubbles <break time='200ms'/> enter <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> glass. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

8.text: (5)Turn the glass.................. a) to a side. b) upside down.
8.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>(5)Turn <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> glass.................. <break time='200ms'/> a) <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> side. <break time='200ms'/> b) <break time='200ms'/> upside <break time='200ms'/> down. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>
